data.prayer: Please, convict the 2,300 believers in Dennery, Saint Lucia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dennery, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Dennery, Saint Lucia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 2,300 believers in Dennery, Saint Lucia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Dennery, Saint Lucia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Dennery
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Dennery, Dennery, Saint Lucia.
Father, we ask for 2 new simple churches in the state of Dennery, Saint Lucia. Place a simple church in every community of the 12,600 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Dennery.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Dennery, Saint Lucia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
